Is your question not in the list, or would you like to provide us with feedback? Then you can reach us at the e-mail address idont@know.com.
Yes. Visit the \'settings\' page and change the scheme to dark-mode.
Can I change the colors of the app?
Can I buy tickets for the movie theater with this app?
You cannot. This app is not a streaming service.
How can I watch series/movies using this app?

This app was developed for the purpose of the DBL App Development course at the Technical University of Eindhoven. It was developed by the members of group 22. For the functioning of this app information is retrieved using the MovieDB API.
